title: The Dark Side of the Nail Salon Industry
teaser: A recent New York Times investigation uncovered epidemic wage violations of nail salon workers who are exposed to dangerous fumes. Kathleen's guests include an investigative reporter who helped reveal some of the occupational threats inside the industry, as well as a labor leader who is pressuring elected officials to submit new legislation to protect nail salon workers.
